about: Hello! My name is Ruslan Titarenko, and I am a passionate programmer. I have a wide range of interests and skills in the field of technology and software development, spanning from web development to game development. I am a self-taught programmer, constantly learning and exploring various areas of computer science and software development. My expertise lies in web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Additionally, I have experience with technologies such as WPF, WinForms, Unity, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, and 3D modeling. Currently, I am pursuing a degree in Computer Science at Donetsk National University named after Vasyl Stus. I am open to new challenges and always eager to learn and enhance my skills to create innovative and high-quality solutions in the field of programming.

education.institution: Podil Scientific and Technical Lyceum for Gifted Youth
Don State University named after Vasily Stus
